name: siakad-uniman
description: Sistem Informasi Akademik modern dengan Next.js dan Laravel

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && php artisan serve" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && composer install && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate

author: Wirooo03
